<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Create Provider"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/organizations/providers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new SSO provider configuration.

Supported provider types:
- oidc: OpenID Connect
- saml: SAML 2.0 (coming soon)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"slug":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z-]+$","title":"Slug"},"name":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Name"},"description":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Description"},"flags":{"anyOf":[{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Flags"},"settings":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object","title":"Settings"}},"type":"object","required":["slug","settings"],"title":"OrganizationProviderCreate","description":"Request model for creating an SSO provider."}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
